    • Uses of Matrix4 in ray.rage.scene

      Methods in ray.rage.scene that return Matrix4 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Matrix4 Node.getLocalTransform()
      Gets the combined relative translation, rotation, and scaling transforms of this node.
      Matrix4 Camera.Frustum.getProjectionMatrix()
      Gets the projection matrix for this frustum.
      Matrix4 Camera.Frustum.getViewMatrix()
      Gets the view matrix for this frustum.
      Matrix4 Node.getWorldTransform()
      Gets the combined derived translation, rotation, and scaling transforms of this node, as derived from all its parents, specifically in that order.
